main_name: Melbourne Breakfast Loose Leaf Everyday Tin
product_name: Melbourne Breakfast Loose Leaf Everyday Tin
description: When the winds start howling, this brew will see you through. Indulge a little with this full-bodied vanilla sweet tea – bound to keep you cosy all year 'round. Sip it up Melbourne style!Enjoy with: Perfect on its own or with a dash of milk.Store in a cool, dry place.
ingredients_detail: Black tea, natural and artificial vanilla flavouring

product_name: New York Breakfast Loose Leaf Gift Cube

description: Complex, spicy and incredibly tasty, our signature chai blend is a unique classic. Perfect to wrap your hands around on a chilly afternoon. Traditionally brewed with milk and honey.Enjoy with: Milk and honey.Store in a cool, dry place.
ingredients_detail: Black tea, cloves, cardamon, star anise, cinnamon, ginger, natural and artificial flavouring

main_name: Earl Grey Loose Leaf Gift Cube
product_name: Earl Grey Loose Leaf Gift Cube
description: Earl Grey is a Sri Lankan black tea combined with the citrus delights of bergamot, generating an elegant and balanced full flavoured cup. An afternoon tea essential.Enjoy with: Perfect on its own.Store in a cool, dry place.

main_name: French Earl Grey Loose Leaf Everyday Tin
product_name: French Earl Grey Loose Leaf Everyday Tin
description: Earl Grey gets a French twist which is oh-so-fruity. A medium-bodied black tea base with pretty petals and notes of fruit that play with classic bergamot in an inspiring, bold and refined infusion.Enjoy with: Perfect on its own.Store in a cool, dry place.
ingredients_detail: Black tea, natural and artificial flavouring, hibiscus, sunflower petals, rose petals, mallow flowers

main_name: English Breakfast Loose Leaf Gift Cube
product_name: English Breakfast Loose Leaf Gift Cube
description: A traditional blend of Sri Lankan broken-leaf teas that produces a coppery liquor with an assertive aroma. The flavour is bright and brisk, perfect any time of the day.Enjoy with: Milk.Store in a cool, dry place.

main_name: Sticky Honey Chai Loose Leaf Everyday Foil
product_name: Sticky Honey Chai Loose Leaf Everyday Foil
description: Hold onto your teacups, chai lovers! We’ve taken rich black tea, added toasted spices, then soaked it all in loads of sticky-sweet honey to create a perfectly balanced and simply sensational wet chai dripping with rich notes of cinnamon and vanilla.
ingredients_detail: For the perfect brew: Place 2 teaspoons Sticky Honey Chai and 250ml/8.4fl oz milk in a saucepan and heat, stirring constantly. Strain into a cup using a Sticky Chai Strainer. For a lighter brew, use an evenly split ratio of milk and water.

main_name: Morning Sunshine Loose Leaf Gift Cube
product_name: Morning Sunshine Loose Leaf Gift Cube
description: Introducing our ultimate breakfast brew! This luxurious blend combines a harmonious mix of Assam, Darjeeling and Rwandan estate black teas. The perfect go-to daily cuppa, each cup offers robust malty notes, muscatels and a touch of mellow fruitiness. Out of the ordinary and simply exceptional, this bright brew’s just the sip to wake up to.

main_name: Creme Brulee Loose Leaf Gift Cube
product_name: Creme Brulee Loose Leaf Gift Cube
description: A decadent sweet treat. Velvety vanilla plays with rich caramel and smooth hazelnuts in a gorgeously golden brew. An intense aroma that enhances a glorious infusion.Enjoy with: Perfect on its own or with a dash of milk.Store in a cool, dry place.
ingredients_detail: Black tea, artificial flavouring, pieces (sugar,), natural and artificial cream flavouring (0.73%)
